Body.Content:
As part of ongoing improvements, the Microsoft 365 Feed widget is no longer available with the Microsoft 365 Feed app for enterprise and business users. We intend to bring this widget back in the future along with additional new features. In the meantime, please visit the Microsoft Store for alternatives. 

When will this happen: 
The Microsoft 365 Feed widget has already been removed from the Microsoft 365 Feed app.

How this will affect your organization: 
Enterprise and business users of the Microsoft 365 Feed widget may notice the widget has been removed from the Microsoft 365 Feed app.

What you need to do to prepare: 
Only enterprise and business devices are affected, and IT admins should prepare to manage questions about the widget's unavailability. Users of the Microsoft 365 Feed widget should visit the Microsoft Store to browse for alternatives.

Title: The Microsoft 365 Feed widget is no longer available with the Microsoft 365 Feed app
